name: Test Fire
description:
A prototype for a Third Person Shooter made in the Unreal Engine 4 while learning how to build shooter mechanics and use the Unreal Engine.  Test Fire features an obstacle course filled with targets, weapons, and traps to test out game features in a level. 
There is no proper menu system implemented, just press the Escape(Esc) Key to exit the game when you are done. 

Features

  • Weapon Pickup and Swapping
  • Reloading
  • Grenades
  • Over the Shoulder Aiming
  • Bullet Time (Slow Motion)

Targets

  • Small wood target
  • Large wood targets
  • Moving wood targets
  • Special wood targets
  • Turrets
  • Glass panes

This project may be updated down the road. Especially after receiving some initial feedback. 
Thank you for checking it out!
